fields.name: Chicken Biryani (Halal)
fields.ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken, onions, tomatoes, yogurt, garlic, ginger, biryani spices (cumin, coriander, cardamom, cinnamon, bay leaves), saffron, ghee, cilantro, mint.
fields.allergens: Dairy (yogurt), if garnished with nuts (check for tree nuts).

fields.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry (Vegetarian)
fields.ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snow peas), soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, vegetable oil.

fields.name: Lamb Tagine (Halal)
fields.ingredients: Lamb, onions, garlic, ginger, apricots, almonds, cinnamon, saffron, cumin, coriander, olive oil.

fields.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers (Vegetarian)
fields.ingredients: Bell peppers, rice, black beans, corn, tomatoes, onions, garlic, cumin, chili powder, cilantro.
fields.allergens: Allergens: None (check for cross-contamination if needed).

fields.name: Grilled Salmon (Halal)
fields.ingredients: Salmon fillets, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dill, salt, pepper.

fields.name: Paneer Tikka Masala (Vegetarian)
fields.ingredients: Paneer cheese, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, coriander, cream, butter, cilantro.

fields.name: Hummus and Pita Bread (Side)
fields.ingredients: Chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, pita bread.

fields.name: Tabbouleh (Side)
fields.ingredients: Parsley, tomatoes, bulgur wheat, cucumbers, mint, lemon juice, olive oil.

fields.name: Falafel (Side)
fields.ingredients: Chickpeas, onions, garlic, cumin, coriander, parsley, baking powder, flour, vegetable oil.
fields.allergens: Gluten (flour), if fried in oil used for other items, risk of cross-contamination.

fields.name: Samosas (Side)
fields.ingredients: Potatoes, peas, onions, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, flour, oil.
fields.allergens: Gluten (flour), if fried in oil used for other items, risk of cross-contamination.

fields.name: Mixed Green Salad (Side)
fields.ingredients: Mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper.
